designSystemProfile.name: Daylight-Inspired Minimal Product Design
designSystemProfile.purpose: Define the aesthetic, structure, and design principles from the Daylight DC-1 product website to replicate its clean, premium style for other projects.

overallAesthetic.mood: A balance of high-end consumer tech and natural softness — blending engineering precision with organic warmth.

usageGuidelines.backgroundUsage: Large soft neutrals; use white or near-white for most sections.
usageGuidelines.accentUsage: High contrast call-to-action buttons or small highlights (e.g., price, order button).
usageGuidelines.textUsage: Use rich black for main headings, softer gray for body text.

typography.typeMood: Elegant and readable; modern serif paired with a humanist sans-serif.

styles.headlines: Sentence-case with subtle tracking; ample line-height.
styles.emphasis: Use weight contrast, not color or italics.

pageStructure: Hero section (large product photo + concise pitch)
Key Features grid (3–6 items with icons/text)
FAQ or testimonial section (light dividers, calm spacing)

grid.behavior: Centered layout with large white margins, vertical rhythm between 80–120px per section.

visualRhythm.alignment: Left-aligned text with right-heavy imagery for hero/product sections.

primary.hover: darken background slightly with smooth transition

featureCard.layout: Icon or photo above heading, then one-sentence description.

productGallery.behavior: Carousel or image grid; large hero photo + thumbnails.
productGallery.interaction: Soft shadow hover or slight elevation on active image.

specGrid.contentStyle: Each column features small image, bold heading, 1-line description, subtle divider below.

faq.style: Minimal, calm spacing, no heavy icons

footer.layout: Simple, one-line navigation links and brand mark
